task.title: Create NAT Gateway
task.shortdesc: To allow YMP LAN (eth0) and SBC LAN (eth1) in your VPC to initiate outbound connections to the internet but prevent unsolicited inbound connections from the internet, you need to create a NAT gateway.

step.cmd: In the navigation pane, select NAT Gateways, click Create NAT Gateway.
On the configuration page, select Subnet to the SBC WAN subnet.
Select Elastic IP Allocation ID which is for SBC WAN.
